name: MAFIA-MD
description: I am MAFIA MD, a Simple WhatsApp Bot built with NodeJs to Enhance WhatsApp Communication experience

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session-id here. Must Start with 'MAFIA-MD~'

MODE.description: Set Mode  to 'public' to work in all chats only, 'inbox' to work in pm(inbox) chats only or 'private' to work for you only. Default is 'public'. You can set up this later using .mode

ANTI_DELETE.description: Can be set to 'inboxonly' to recover for personal chats only, 'chatsonly' to recover for groups and personal chats only or 'true' to recover all chats and status updates. Default is 'false'. You can set up this later using .antidelete

SUDO_NUMBERS.description: Put Sudo Numbers separated by comma Here ie 923xxxx,923xxxxx,923xxxxx. Sudos have same rights as owner(can command the bot). if you don't want leave the space empty

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put only one Owner Number Here ie 923xxxxx

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want bot to view statuses. You can set up this later using .autoview

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want bot to read and like statuses. You can set up this later using .autolike

AUTO_LIKE_EMOJIS.description: Input your custom status like emoji(s) else leave to use default emojis. Only works if autolike status is 'true'

AUTO_REPLY_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want the bot to send message after viewing status

STATUS_REPLY_MSG.description: Set your status reply message to be sent after bot views status

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Enter value to 'true' for blueticking all messages, or 'commands' for blueticking only commands else false. You can set up this later using .autoread

PRESENCE.description: Put 'online' for always online, 'typing' for always typing a message, 'recording' for always recording audio or 'null' to maintain your presence. You can set up this later using .presence

ANTILINK.description: Enter 'true' to delete links and kick the user automatically or 'delete' to delete the links without kicking the user or 'warn' to warn users 3 times before kicking them. You can set up this later using .antilink

ANTIBAD.description: Enter 'true' to automatically delete bad words sent by users in groups. You can set up this later using .antibad

BAD_WORDS.description: Enter bad words separated by a comma(will be deleted if ANTIBAD is set to true)

AUTO_AUDIO.description: Put 'true' if you want the bot to automatically send audio(auto voice) in chat if you use  words such as: hi, hello, good morning, good night. You can set up this later using .autoaudio

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Provide country codes you want the bot to automatically block

AUTO_REACT.description: Put 'true' if you want the bot to auto react to messages. You can set up this later using .autoreact

ANTICALL.description: Make it 'true' if you want to automatically reject calls or 'block' to decline calls and block caller. You can set up this later using .anticall

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Put Your own Anticall Message the bot will send after rejecting calls

BOT_NAME.description: You can edit this but maintain font style for uniformity. Use 'Fonts Type Keyboard' for styles.

BOT_PIC.description: put here the bot Menu url if you don't have you can use this public url.

PACK_NAME.description: You can enter your sticker pack name.

PREFIX.description: Your Bot Prefix (default: .) You can put your own custom prefix
